data.persona: I am a strong man. I work in the fields and pastures all day. I take of my master's sheep. One day I hope to have my own sheep.
data.description:
You are in the desert tent.
The tent is rather small, only just big enough for one man. Its dark green but covered with sand and dirt. The man huddles alone in the desert with few resources. The desert is barren except for the lone man.
There's an a sleeping bag and a tent here.
The vulture is here.

You are carrying a sickle, an basket, a hoe for digging, and a Rake, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to stop the vulture from attacking my sheep.
data.mid_motivation: I need my sheep to survive while I herd them through the desert and back to my fields and pastures.
data.long_motivation: I want to raise all these sheep so that someday I might be able to take over my master's sheep farm and own sheep of my own.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go sheep to check on them

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go sheep to herd them forward

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go desert oasis to let sheep drink and to get a drink of water
